content: Hi @wg-incr-comp ; I’m pretty swamped with stuff, and I have nothing to report for today’s meeting. I think @Wesley Wiser is similarly swamped with their new job. I think my own time today would be better spent on something other than the synchronous meeting.

Is there anyone who thinks there’s value in having a synchronous meeting today? We could post async status reports in a zulip topic if people think there’s something to report, but I suspect we’ll be better off just regrouping in two weeks after the March sprint.
Most of my time has been spent trying to figure out memory profiling on Windows for the upcoming sprint.
@Wesley Wiser are you working with @rylev on that?
In preparation for the next meeting, can I have a few comments on my incr-comp projects HackMD? I can defend a few points during the meeting if you need me to.
@cjgillot we should definitely put that on agenda for next meeting
